doc.title: Life & Death
doc.plot: An arrogant, amoral film agent is involved with a car accident on his way to the office leading to strange things starting to happen. In mysterious circumstances he is given an unexpected assignment to meet a new comedy act "Life and Death" for a proposed 24hr T.V show. At the meeting the comedy act hold a mystical empowerment over the agent's decisions, where he's instructed to travel into the unknown to retrieve past footage. As the agent gets closer to the package, future and past visions distort his reality creating a game of wills between life and death for the possession of his soul.
